content: color chain 30 chain 35 and chain 40 cut the yarn leave a tail for sewing fig 14 14 18 tentacles third type make 3 use the mauve yarn chain 45 start in second chain from hook 3 half_double_crochet in each chain stitch 132 19 cut the yarn leave a tail for sewing 15 20 16 21 use the hook attach the tentacles third type through the magic_ring of the bottom part insert the hook from the wrong side to outside pick up the tails and pull it through attach the tentacles first and second types fig 17 18 19 between rounds 1 and 2 fig 22 23 24 secure the tails on the wrong side by going across the loops using the needle as show 3 22 27 23 28 24 29 sew the bottom part to the back loops round 21 of the body fig 25 26 27 at last sew the spots on the body fig 30 25 find the pattern of spots in the pattern of whale 30 26 4
